definition: marine worms having a row of tufted gills along each side of the back, carry with difficulty
details:
noun
- marine worms having a row of tufted gills along each side of the back
= synonyms: lugworm
- a projecting piece that is used to lift or support or turn something
- a sail with four corners that is hoisted from a yard that is oblique to the mast
= synonyms: lugsail
verb
- carry with difficulty
= example: carry with difficulty
= synonyms: tug
- obstruct
= synonyms: block
